import "./AboutUsStyles.css" function AboutUs(){ return(

Our History

Trippy is owned and managed by Trippy .in Pvt. Ltd., a leading brand in web designing services and e-commerce solutions. Trippy .in Pvt. Ltd. is counted for its expertise in web solutions and its top ranking businesss portals. Our invincible expertice and rich experience has raised our spirit to rech ahead from our clients expextion. Commendable sucess of other portals managed by Trippy is a live paradigm of our work excellence.

Our Mission

Our mission is to touch the horizon where our compabilities may succesfully meet with the requiremnets of our clients, that too withultimate transparency and cost-effectiveness.

Our Vision

To swa the seeds of par-excellence services with customer centric approach and reap the trust of worldwide clients.
